content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":174251,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どっか似てやがんだ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"He somehow reminds me of someone..."},{"lineNumber":174252,"originalJapaneseLine":"「敵に情けをかけるような奴かよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Is he the kind of guy to show mercy to an enemy...?"},{"lineNumber":174253,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……生まれて初めて、本気で戦ったんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"...For the first time in my life, I fought seriously."},{"lineNumber":174254,"originalJapaneseLine":"　負けちまったが……","translatedEnglishLine":"I ended up losing, but..."},{"lineNumber":174255,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すげぇぇぇぇ満足してやがるぜ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm unbelievably satisfied..."},{"lineNumber":174256,"originalJapaneseLine":"「蛇足はいらねぇ。","translatedEnglishLine":"No needless words."},{"lineNumber":174257,"originalJapaneseLine":"　スパッと終わらせてくれや……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Just finish this quickly..."},{"lineNumber":174258,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":174259,"originalJapaneseLine":"諦めた様子のケイブリスは神妙に首を差しだす。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kebliss, looking resigned, solemnly stretched out his neck."},{"lineNumber":174260,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスがカオスを構えて近づいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance prepared Chaos and approached."},{"lineNumber":174261,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんてなぁああぁぁああぁあ！","translatedEnglishLine":"Just kiddinggggg!"},{"lineNumber":174262,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ぎゃあはぁはぁはぁはぁ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Gyaahahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":174263,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス様！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Lance!?"},{"lineNumber":174264,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケイブリスの鋼鉄すら斬り裂く爪が","translatedEnglishLine":"Kebliss’s steel-rending claws"},{"lineNumber":174265,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスに迫る。","translatedEnglishLine":"came rushing towards Lance."},{"lineNumber":174266,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、が……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, ugh..."},{"lineNumber":174267,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし、ランスはすんでのところでかわし、","translatedEnglishLine":"However, Lance narrowly dodged,"},{"lineNumber":174268,"originalJapaneseLine":"代わりにカオスを脳天に突き刺した。","translatedEnglishLine":"and instead stabbed Chaos into the top of his head."},{"lineNumber":174269,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふんっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmph..."},{"lineNumber":174270,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前がそう簡単に諦めるような奴かよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Are you the kind of guy to give up so easily?"},{"lineNumber":174271,"originalJapaneseLine":"「トドメだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"This is the finishing blow."},{"lineNumber":174272,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ラーンスあたたたたーーーっく！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Laaance attaaaack!"},{"lineNumber":174273,"originalJapaneseLine":"必殺の一撃がケイブリスの巨体を両断する。","translatedEnglishLine":"The deadly strike cleaved Kebliss’s massive body in two."},{"lineNumber":174274,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ケッ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Keh..."},{"lineNumber":174275,"originalJapaneseLine":"「結局、最後まで……」","translatedEnglishLine":"In the end, until the very last..."},{"lineNumber":174276,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へっ……ま、いいや……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmph... well, whatever..."},{"lineNumber":174277,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして、ケイブリスが崩れ落ちた。","translatedEnglishLine":"And then, Kebliss collapsed."},{"lineNumber":174278,"originalJapaneseLine":"「死んだ、か……」","translatedEnglishLine":"He’s dead, huh..."},{"lineNumber":174279,"originalJapaneseLine":"「立派な最期でした」","translatedEnglishLine":"That was a dignified end."},{"lineNumber":174280,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おお……","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh..."},{"lineNumber":174281,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もし、最初からああなら俺ら……","translatedEnglishLine":"If he had been like that from the start, we..."},{"lineNumber":174282,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……彼は全てを失うことで、","translatedEnglishLine":"...He lost everything,"},{"lineNumber":174283,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本来の姿に戻れたのです。","translatedEnglishLine":"and was able to return to his original form."},{"lineNumber":174284,"originalJapaneseLine":"　意味のない空想ですよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s just meaningless fantasy..."},{"lineNumber":174285,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ……","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah..."},{"lineNumber":174286,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんでもないさ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s nothing..."},{"lineNumber":174287,"originalJapaneseLine":"「シィーーーーール！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Shiーーiiーru!"},{"lineNumber":174288,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はい！？","translatedEnglishLine":"Y-Yes!?"},{"lineNumber":174289,"originalJapaneseLine":"　な、なんですか、ランス様！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"W-What is it, Lord Lance!?"},{"lineNumber":174290,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もう、限界、だ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I’m already at my limit..."},{"lineNumber":174291,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、きゃ、きゃ、ランス様！」","translatedEnglishLine":"A-ah, kyaa, Lord Lance!"},{"lineNumber":174292,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルに抱きつくような形になりながら、","translatedEnglishLine":"As he clung onto Sheila,"},{"lineNumber":174293,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスがずるずると崩れ落ち、膝枕をさせた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance slowly crumbled down and rested his head on her lap."},{"lineNumber":174294,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、やっぱお前の膝枕が","translatedEnglishLine":"Mmm, after all, your lap pillow is"},{"lineNumber":174295,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一番寝心地がいいな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"the most comfortable for sleeping..."},{"lineNumber":174296,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、いっぱいお休みして下さい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, please get plenty of rest..."},{"lineNumber":174297,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし……","translatedEnglishLine":"But..."},{"lineNumber":174298,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ああ、疲れた」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, I’m tired."},{"lineNumber":174299,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふん、だが……","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmph, but..."},{"lineNumber":174300,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がはははははははは！","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahahahahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":174301,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺様の勝っちーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I’m the winnerーーー!"},{"lineNumber":174302,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あるじ、平気？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Master, are you alright?"},{"lineNumber":174303,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おう、シャリエラ、見てたか？","translatedEnglishLine":"Yeah, Shariella, did you see that?"},{"lineNumber":174304,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前の為に勝ってやったぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I won for you."},{"lineNumber":174305,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、見てた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Yeah, I saw."},{"lineNumber":174306,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いっぱい見てた」","translatedEnglishLine":"I saw a lot."},{"lineNumber":174307,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうだ、俺様は格好いいだろう！","translatedEnglishLine":"How about that? I’m pretty cool, right!"},{"lineNumber":174308,"originalJapaneseLine":"　がはははははははは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahahahahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":174309,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……うん」","translatedEnglishLine":"...Yeah."},{"lineNumber":174310,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とっても格好良かった」","translatedEnglishLine":"You were really cool."}]}

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He somehow reminds me of someone...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「敵に情けをかけるような奴かよ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is he the kind of guy to show mercy to an enemy...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……生まれて初めて、本気で戦ったんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...For the first time in my life, I fought seriously.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すげぇぇぇぇ満足してやがるぜ……」
スパッと終わらせてくれや……」
諦めた様子のケイブリスは神妙に首を差しだす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kebliss, looking resigned, solemnly stretched out his neck.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがカオスを構えて近づいた。
「なんてなぁああぁぁああぁあ！
ぎゃあはぁはぁはぁはぁ！」
ケイブリスの鋼鉄すら斬り裂く爪が
しかし、ランスはすんでのところでかわし、
代わりにカオスを脳天に突き刺した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and instead stabbed Chaos into the top of his head.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前がそう簡単に諦めるような奴かよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you the kind of guy to give up so easily?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ラーンスあたたたたーーーっく！」
必殺の一撃がケイブリスの巨体を両断する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The deadly strike cleaved Kebliss’s massive body in two.
In the end, until the very last...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、ケイブリスが崩れ落ちた。
もし、最初からああなら俺ら……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If he had been like that from the start, we...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本来の姿に戻れたのです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and was able to return to his original form.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意味のない空想ですよ……」
な、なんですか、ランス様！？」
シィルに抱きつくような形になりながら、
ランスがずるずると崩れ落ち、膝枕をさせた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance slowly crumbled down and rested his head on her lap.
Mmm, after all, your lap pillow is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、いっぱいお休みして下さい……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, please get plenty of rest...
Yeah, Shariella, did you see that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前の為に勝ってやったぞ」
「どうだ、俺様は格好いいだろう！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How about that? I’m pretty cool, right!

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
